channel.title: Firework launcher
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Firework launcher" - please answer me!

item.title: Re: Firework launcher
item.content:encoded:
Sandwich Dispenser (-1 Gen/Nin +4 Tai) - Gotten from a quest that appears on Tuesdays when you have 21+ Tai.
Flame Thrower (-1 Nin/Tai, +4 Gen) - Gotten for spending 12 Z-Rewards.

Also, they all add up to +2, not +3 (+4 -1 -1 = +2).

item.title: Firework launcher
item.content:encoded: i have a question, i know that the firework launcher gives you 4 ninjutsu levels but minus 1 in gen and tai, and i know that there are 2 perms, that give 4 in tai and gen, but minus 1 on the other two stats, so they together with the firework launcher gives a total of 3 levels in all stats without the penalties, and my question was that if anyone knowns the name of the items i described here, thanks in advance.
